text:
Poornima (15), a Standard X student of Government Girls Higher Secondary school at Kunnathur, was allegedly murdered by a 25-year-old youth at Nalligoundenpalayam early on Friday.

After killing the girl by causing a slit on her throat with a knife, he tried to kill himself.

He has been admitted to a hospital in Salem.The incident occurred near the girl's house around 1 a.m. while she was returning after New Year celebrations.
title: Girl found dead
